uk.gov.gchq.gaffer.parquetstore.utils

Class GafferGroupObjectConverter

  • java.lang.Object
    • uk.gov.gchq.gaffer.parquetstore.utils.GafferGroupObjectConverter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable

    public class GafferGroupObjectConverter
extends Object
implements Serializable
    This class contains the logic for converting objects between the Gaffer, Parquet and Spark types for a single Gaffer group.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      Constructor and Description

      Constructor to set up the converter ready to convert between the Gaffer, Spark and Parquet types.

    • Constructor Detail

      • GafferGroupObjectConverter

        public GafferGroupObjectConverter(String group,
                                  Map<String,String> columnToSerialiserName,
                                  Map<String,Serialiser> serialiserNameToSerialiser,
                                  Map<String,String[]> columnToPaths)
        Constructor to set up the converter ready to convert between the Gaffer, Spark and Parquet types.
        Parameters:
        group - The Gaffer Group name
        columnToSerialiserName - A mapping from Gaffer column to serialiser name
        serialiserNameToSerialiser - A mapping from serialiser name to serialiser object
        columnToPaths - A mapping from Gaffer column to the Parquet columns derived from that Gaffer column

    • Method Detail

      • gafferObjectToParquetObjects

        public Object[] gafferObjectToParquetObjects(String gafferColumn,
                                             Object gafferObject)
                                      throws SerialisationException
        Converts a Gaffer object from a single Gaffer column to the representative Parquet objects, using the relevant serialiser.
        Parameters:
        gafferColumn - The name of the Gaffer column
        gafferObject - The Gaffer object to be converted
        Returns:
        an Object[] of the Parquet objects, one for each derived Parquet column
        Throws:
        SerialisationException - If the serialiser throws a SerialisationException when serialising

      • parquetObjectsToGafferObject

        public Object parquetObjectsToGafferObject(String gafferColumn,
                                           Object[] parquetObjects)
                                    throws SerialisationException
        Generates the Gaffer object from the Parquet objects using the relevant serialiser's de-serialise method.
        Parameters:
        gafferColumn - The name of the Gaffer column
        parquetObjects - The Object[] of the Parquet objects, one for each Parquet column that was derived from this Gaffer column
        Returns:
        The Gaffer object
        Throws:
        SerialisationException - If the serialiser throws a SerialisationException when de-serialising

      • sparkRowToGafferObject

        public Object sparkRowToGafferObject(String gafferColumn,
                                     org.apache.spark.sql.Row row)
                              throws SerialisationException
        Extracts an object corresponding to column gafferColumn from the provided GenericRowWithSchema.
        Parameters:
        gafferColumn - the column to extract
        row - the row to extract from
        Returns:
        the extracted Object
        Throws:
        SerialisationException - if the conversion from Parquet objects to the original object throws a SerialisationException

      • addGafferObjectToSparkRow

        public void addGafferObjectToSparkRow(String column,
                                      Object gafferObject,
                                      ArrayList<Object> recordBuilder,
                                      org.apache.spark.sql.types.StructType sparkSchema)
                               throws SerialisationException
        Converts the provided gafferObject into objects as specified by the sparkSchema.
        Parameters:
        column - the column that the gafferObject has come from
        gafferObject - the gafferObject to be converted
        recordBuilder - the ArrayList to add the objects resulting from the conversion to
        sparkSchema - the StructType that defines the Spark schema
        Throws:
        SerialisationException - if the gafferObject cannot be serialised

      • buildElementFromParquetObjects

        public Element buildElementFromParquetObjects(Map<String,Object[]> parquetColumnToObject,
                                              boolean isEntity)
                                       throws SerialisationException
        Builds up a Gaffer element using a map of parquetColumn to Object[] containing the relevant objects stored in that column
        Parameters:
        parquetColumnToObject - is a map from parquet column path to a list of the objects stored on that path which only contains more then 1 if the column is storing an array or part of a map
        isEntity - is it an Entity that needs building
        Returns:
        an Element containing the objects from the parquetColumnToObject
        Throws:
        SerialisationException - if the parquet objects can not be de-serialised
